pullRequest.title: HDDS-4460. Add metrics for closed container replication
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Today it's hard to understand what's going on and what is the performance of the replication.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-4460
How was this patch tested?

Started docker compose cluster
Generated keys
Removed one datanode
Restored one datanode
Waited until data is replicated
Checked the metrics

commit.message: HDDS-4460. Add metrics for closed container replication

nodes.bodyText:
did you forget a pair of brackets here? Like
(Instant.now().getNano() - task.getQueued().getNano()) / 1_000_000;
